comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Should be Seamen's Institute, not Seaman's. See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3239312588/ for similar picture.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for catching the spelling error on this one, too!  We'll adjust the title in the source data and reload the description to Flickr.

comment.author: 52251521@N05
comment._content:
Marvelous photo collection here. Diving into the past is a passion of ours, too. Thank you for sharing these images. If anyone is interested in the RMS Titanic, you should check out photos from our recent mission, Expedition Titanic. We have first-time high definition sonar imaging of the Ship, a map of the entire miles-wide debris field, plus other exclusive footage from the expedition. Images and video live on our website, ExpeditionTitanic.com, with more photos on Flickr and Facebook as well.
Much obliged,
RMST
